conformance.naming

Class ContactTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • test.Test
      • conformance.naming.NamingTest
        • conformance.naming.ContactTest

  • public class ContactTest
extends NamingTest
    Tests that the naming server is listening on the correct ports.

    This test creates two sockets and attempts to connect to the naming server client service and registration ports. The test succeeds if both connections are accepted.

      • probe

        private void probe(int port,
                   String interface_name)
            throws TestFailed
        Attempts to connect to a listening socket at the given port.

        The connection is attempted to the local host.

        Parameters:
        port - The port on which to request connection.
        interface_name - The name of the interface to which the connection is being made. This is used for the error message in case an exception occurs.
        Throws:
        TestFailed - If the connection attempt fails.
